#define S(a) scanf("%d",&(a))

int main(){
    int t;
    S(t);
    while(t--){
        int a,b;
        int x,y;
        S(a);S(b);S(x);S(y);
        int mx = max(a-x,x-1);
        int my = max(b-y,y-1);
        P(mx+my);
        NL;
    }
    return 0;
}
